May 13, 2025:Dixon Technologies announced a Board Meeting for May 20, 2025, to approve audited financial results for the quarter and financial year ending March 31, 2025, and consider a dividend recommendation for the same period. The trading window was closed from April 1, 2025, and would reopen 48 hours after the results were declared.

May 21, 2025:Dixon Technologies was highlighted as a stock to watch after reporting a substantial increase in consolidated profit (378% year-over-year) and revenue (121%). The company also reported an exceptional gain and declared a final dividend of ₹8 per share for FY25. There was notable activity in call options, particularly at the ₹16,000 strike price.

February 19, 2025:It was reported that Dixon Technologies planned to inaugurate its Sriperumbudur plant, for manufacturing laptops, servers, and SSDs, by May 2025. The planned investment for this facility is ₹1,000 crore.

These updates indicate Dixon Technologies' strong financial performance and strategic expansion plans around May 2025.
